text:
Hi there,
I can't build FOP from the java sources downloaded from apache. There are java 
files importing org.apache.fop.fo.properties.* (e.g. 
org.apache.fop.layout.LineArea does), but there is no directory 'properties' 
in '...fop.fo'. The classes required are even missing in the whole 
org.apache.fop.* directory subtree. What's wrong?

Sincerely, Markus
creator: markusmueller@web.de
oleg@tkachenko.com
text:
This package is generated during fop build process, see build.xml. Use
build.bat/build.sh or build.xml directly with Ant to build fop.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
